column4: just installed ubuntu 12.04, and grabbed chrome, any ideas why flash pages like pandora or youtube would be basically unusable and lag the hell out of everything
I installed 12.04, cleanly.  Downloaded and installed chrome.
Now pandora is slow and lags my entire system if i open it in chrome, and youtube is about useless as it plays funky speeds
(you can, and should, use the HTML5 version of YouTube. Solves the problem with that one site. ;-)
but not why flash doesn't work
Well, why Flash "doesn't work" is a whole 'nother discussion, I'm afraid. ;-)
